description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting response closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. Unless specified otherwise in the tender opportunity, all required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by March 5th, 2024 at 14:00 EST. All responses submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the submission being declared non-responsive. This solicitation is for the requirement of the supply, delivery, installation of and hands-on training on one Industrial Shredder.
duration_in_months: There is no estimated duration in the information provided.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP): Industrial Shredder for Department of National Defence

**Reference Number and Solicitation Number:**
WS4379748811-Doc4402111184, WS4379748811

**Tender Publication Date and Closing Date:**
Publication date: January 31, 2024
Closing date: March 5, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Type and Procurement Method:**
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) with a competitive, open bidding method.

**Procurement Category:**
Goods and Services (GD)

**UNSPSC Code:**
44101603 - Paper Shredding Machines or Accessories

**Trade Agreements:**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity and Delivery:**
N/A, Nova Scotia (region of delivery)

**Contracting Entity and End User:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contracting Entity Contact:**
Jayme-Lynn Mauchner (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: jayme-lynn.mauchner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (Not available)

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18558267?extsite=MTg1NTgyNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description:**
This RFP is for the supply, delivery, installation, and hands-on training on one Industrial Shredder. All required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on March 5, 2024.

---

I made some trivial changes to better support the readability of the markdown content. If there were issues you can contact me.
